about_the_game:
HOW TO ACCESS BONUS CONTENT

The digital bonuses are kept in a folder called Digital Limited Pack, within the folder that you installed the game to.

You can access the content with the following steps:
1. Right-click the game in your Steam Library, then select Properties.
2. On the Local Files tab, select Browse.

BONUS CONTENT

・Game Art Book
A collection of Double Focus full-color character art and special illustrations.

・Soundtrack
[01_Double Focus Soundtrack]
Featuring special arranged versions of soundtrack songs
[02_Double Focus Original Game BGM]
Featuring recordings of BGM just as it plays in the game
[03_Bullet Report]
The soundtrack to Bullet Report, the game that precedes Double Focus
*This is the same as [04 The Bullet Reporter], the soundtrack included in Genso Wanderer TODR's Digital Limited Pack

・Special Radio Drama
Contains the following three voice dramas:
Aya, Momiji, and the Flying Booth
A Clear, Sunny Mountain With a Chance of Yokai
Momiji Inubashiri's Perfect Patrol Day

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3550
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: XInput Controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3550
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: XInput Controller required

short_description: This DLC includes an artbook and soundtracks for Touhou Double Focus.
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
